DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional design investigation focus socio-demographic , clinical psychosocial characterization Portuguese people haemophilia ( PWH ) . All PWH , register Portuguese Hemophilia Association ( APH ) identify APH registry contact mail , order invite participate first Portuguese survey haemophilia . In case acceptance , patient must sign Informed Consent , fill questionnaire send back investigation team pre-paid envelope national mail system . PWH age invite participate survey . Adults ( age 18 ) children/youth 10 17 answer questionnaire self report . Parents small child ( 0 9 ) fill proxy version . All questionnaire adapt specific age group . This study comply ethic guideline approve Life Sciences Health Ethics Subcommittee ( University Minho ) register Portuguese authority data collection ( CNPD ) .
